results.abstract: Fitness apps and the power of live satellite tracking have allowed runners, cyclists and others to draw hearts, animals, birthday wishes — and even homages to Vermeer — across their local landscapes.

results.title: The Magnificent Poem Jars of David Drake, Center Stage at the Met
results.abstract: Before the Civil War, an enslaved artisan from South Carolina created storage vessels that transcend ceramic traditions.

media.caption: “Storage Jar,” 1858, by David Drake, combines aspects of a message in a bottle and the Liberty Bell. The inscription reads in part: “A very Large Jar which has 4 handles = / pack it full of fresh meats — then light candles.”
media.copyright: Lila Barth for The New York Times

results.title: As Russian Losses Mount in Ukraine, Putin Gets More Involved in War Strategy
results.abstract: The Russian president has rejected requests from commanders in the field that they be allowed to retreat from Kherson, a vital city in Ukraine’s south.
